enchantment.moborigins.ground_spikes.des: Prevents certain origins from slipping on land
text.moborigins.become_elder: You have grown into an Elder Guardian!
origin.moborigins.snowgolem.name: Snow Golem
origin.moborigins.snowgolem.description: Golems made from snow, and weak to anything that might melt them
power.moborigins.heat_weakness.name: Heat Weakness
power.moborigins.heat_weakness.descripti: You take damage over time in hot biomes
power.moborigins.greater_golems.name: Greater Golems
power.moborigins.greater_golems.descript: Snow Golems you make are more powerful
power.moborigins.stronger_snowballs.name: Stronger Snowballs
power.moborigins.stronger_snowballs.desc: Snowballs you throw are packed with ice, and deal 1 damage!
power.moborigins.snow_trail.name: Snow Trail
power.moborigins.snow_trail.description: You leave a trail of snow.
power.moborigins.frigid_strength.name: Frigid Strength
power.moborigins.frigid_strength.descrip: Deal more damage in cold areas.
origin.moborigins.witch.name: Witch
origin.moborigins.witch.description: Cruel and cackling, Witches are masters of brewing, and are great with magic
power.moborigins.potion_action.name: Perfect Potion
power.moborigins.potion_action.descripti: Get a random potion effect, based on the situation you are in.
power.moborigins.pillager_aligned.name: Pillager Aligned
power.moborigins.pillager_aligned.descri: Villagers don't like you, and pillagers like you!
power.moborigins.better_potions.name: Better Potions
power.moborigins.better_potions.descript: You consume potions better than most, Potions will last longer when you drink them.
origin.moborigins.strider.name: Strider
origin.moborigins.strider.description: Travel the vast oceans of lava with the speed of a strider
power.moborigins.lava_walk.name: Lava Walker
power.moborigins.lava_walk.description: You have the ability to walk on lava source blocks! You are also quicker while walking on lava, and slower on land.
power.moborigins.rideable_creature.name: Rideable Creature
origin.moborigins.evoker.name: Evoker
origin.moborigins.evoker.description: Master of Magic, and a collector of Totems.
power.moborigins.summon_fangs.name: Summon Fangs
power.moborigins.summon_fangs.descriptio: You gain the ability to summon fangs!
power.moborigins.lower_totem_chance.name: Arcane Totems
power.moborigins.lower_totem_chance.desc: Totems have a 10% not to break on use
origin.moborigins.guardian.name: Guardian
origin.moborigins.guardian.description: Guardians are known for protecting their Monuments and the treasured sponges within. Some are known for evolving into Elder Guardians.
power.moborigins.guardian_spikes.name: Guardian Spikes
power.moborigins.guardian_spikes.descrip: Spikes that have a chance to damage attackers!
power.moborigins.guardian_ally.name: Guardian Ally
power.moborigins.monument_spawn.name: Monument Home
power.moborigins.monument_spawn.descript: You spawn at a Ocean Monument
power.moborigins.surface_weakness.name: Surface Weakness
power.moborigins.surface_weakness.descri: You are weakened while on land
power.moborigins.prismarine_skin.name: Prismarine Skin
power.moborigins.prismarine_skin.descrip: Your skin is made of prismarine, and you get natural armor from it.
power.moborigins.slippery.name: Slippery
power.moborigins.slippery.description: While on land, everything feels slippery.
origin.moborigins.elder_guardian.name: Elder Guardian
origin.moborigins.elder_guardian.descrip: Elder Guardians are the leaders of monuments, and wield more power than normal guardians
power.moborigins.elder_magic.name: Elder Magic
power.moborigins.elder_magic.description: Summon a effect cloud of mining fatigue
power.moborigins.elder_spikes.name: Elder Spikes
power.moborigins.elder_spikes.descriptio: Stronger Spikes that have a chance to damage attackers!
origin.moborigins.slime.name: Slime
origin.moborigins.slime.description: Green blobs of Jello, that bounce all around!
power.moborigins.bouncy.name: Bouncy
power.moborigins.bouncy.description: All blocks act like slime blocks
power.moborigins.split.name: Split Ability
power.moborigins.split.description: Turn your food points into a small slime to defend you!
power.moborigins.small_weak.name: Small Weakness
power.moborigins.small_weak.description: When at less than 2 hearts, you deal almost no damage, but your attacks have stronger knockback!
origin.moborigins.wolf.name: Wolf
origin.moborigins.wolf.description: Strong and Fast, Wolves are creatures that have strength in numbers.
power.moborigins.alpha_wolf.name: Alpha Wolf
power.moborigins.full_moon.name: Werewolf-like
power.moborigins.full_moon.description: During a full moon, you get Faster, Stronger, and Healthier
power.moborigins.wolf_body.name: Wolf Body
power.moborigins.wolf_body.description: You have 2 less hearts of health than humans.
origin.moborigins.bee.name: Bee
origin.moborigins.bee.description: A flying insect that pollinates the world, spreading flowers and honey all around.
power.moborigins.stinger.name: Stinger
power.moborigins.stinger.description: When you punch someone with your fist, you poison them for a few seconds
power.moborigins.flower_power.name: Flower Power
power.moborigins.flower_power.descriptio: When near multiple flowers, you gain regeneration.
power.moborigins.queen_bee.name: Queen Bee
power.moborigins.queen_bee.description: When you collect honey, the bees won't try to attack you.
power.moborigins.small_bug.name: Small Bug
power.moborigins.small_bug.description: You have 2 less hearts of health than humans.
power.moborigins.bee_wings.name: Bee Wings
power.moborigins.bee_wings.description: You can use your tiny bee wings to descend slower as an ability
origin.moborigins.fox.name: Fox
origin.moborigins.fox.description: Sly and cunning, foxes are timid animals who enjoy eating berries, and stealing items.
power.moborigins.timid_creature.name: Timid Creature
power.moborigins.timid_creature.descript: Your speed increases when you are around more than 3 other players.
power.moborigins.better_berries.name: Better Berries
power.moborigins.better_berries.descript: Berries taste extra delicious to you!
power.moborigins.careful_gatherer.name: Careful Gatherer
power.moborigins.careful_gatherer.descri: Sweet Berry Bushes don't hurt you at all.
power.moborigins.item_collector.name: Item Collector
power.moborigins.item_collector.descript: You have a larger item pickup radius.
power.moborigins.sly.name: Sly
power.moborigins.small_fox.name: Small Fox
power.moborigins.small_fox.description: You have 2 less hearts of health than humans.
power.moborigins.wolf_howl.name: Howl
power.moborigins.wolf_howl.description: You can use your active ability key to howl, and give speed and strength to nearby wolves and yourself.
power.moborigins.wolf_pack.name: Wolf Pack
power.moborigins.wolf_pack.description: When you are near at least 4 wolves, you gain speed and attack damage.
origin.moborigins.drowned.name: Drowned
origin.moborigins.drowned.description: The dwellers of the deep ocean, they wield their tridents and attack the living that dare cross the ocean.
power.moborigins.drowned_vision.name: Soaked Eyes
power.moborigins.drowned_vision.descript: Your eyes are adapted to the water, and when outside of it, everything seems blue.
power.moborigins.trident_expert.name: Trident Expert
power.moborigins.trident_expert.descript: You're a master of the trident, dealing +2 damage when you throw it, and +2 melee damage with it. You can also use channeling with thunder, and use riptide without rain/water at the price of extra durability.
power.moborigins.seas_storm.name: Seas Storm
power.moborigins.seas_storm.description: You can use channeling enchant on tridents irregardless of the weather.
power.moborigins.zombie_hunger.name: Zombie Hunger
power.moborigins.zombie_hunger.descripti: Your constant hunger for flesh makes you exhaust quicker than a human.
power.moborigins.undead.name: Undead
power.moborigins.undead.description: You are undead, and burn in the daylight. You also take more damage from smite.
power.moborigins.overheat.name: Overheat
power.moborigins.overheat.description: You have a temperature bar that slowly begins to fill in hot biomes, and cool in other biomes.
power.moborigins.melting.name: Melting
power.moborigins.melting.description: As your temperature bar fills up, you'll slowly begin to melt in hot biomes, losing health and speed.
power.moborigins.warped_fungus_eater.des: You can eat warped fungus to recover some hunger, along with a small speed boost.
power.moborigins.water_combatant.name: Water Combatant
power.moborigins.water_combatant.descrip: You deal more damage while in water.
power.moborigins.dyeable.name: Dyeable
power.moborigins.dyeable.description: You can click with dye to change the tint of yourself.
